column4: I just installed Windows 7 alongside my installation of the latest release candidate of Ubuntu 9.04, but now Ubuntu doesn't show up on any sort of OS selection screen when I boot. Is there anyway to get back into my Ubuntu install?
yu will need to reinstall grub from live cd
read the pm from ubottu..... that has the link
/ Meson4112 / usr13 : Thanks! :D I'll look at the link
